snippet.title: Postbird in Provence (Video Game Trailer 2021)
snippet.description:
ISART DIGITAL, the video game and 3D animation / VFX School.
Graduation Video Game  

Platform: PC 
Engine: Unity
Number of players: 1
Genre: Exploration / Adventure

Hop on your bike and become Marcel, the new postbird in town! Meet the lovely and quirky people of Montélimace and bring this charming village back to life. Set amongst the lavender fields and fanned by the sea breeze, take a real breath of provençal air.

--

Au guidon de votre vélo triporteur, incarnez Marcel, le nouvel oiseau postier de Montélimace. Partez à la rencontre de ses habitants et redonnez vie à ce pittoresque village provençal. Une véritable bouffée d’air frais entre champs de lavande et chants des cigales.

Ready to play Postbird in Provence? https://isart-digital.itch.io/postbirdinprovence

Producer : Boris BODIANSKY & Steven JOUCLA
Game Art : Alice HIEN, Mélanie L'HUILLIER & Salomé LYSIMAQUE-CHAPUIS
Game Design : Benjamin GIRON & Marceau LIEVREMONT
Game Design & Programming : Adrien BORDES, Colin MONGABURE & Godefroy SALOMON 
Game Programming : Clément FAZILLEAU & Julien SOYSOUVANH
Music & Sound Design : Kevin ENGLAND & Sophie PORET
________________________

🔗 www.isart.fr
📱 Facebook : facebook.com/ISARTDigital
🎙️ Twitter : twitter.com/isartdigital
📷 Instagram : instagram.com/isartdigital
💼 LinkedIn : fr.linkedin.com/company/isart-digital
▶️ Youtube : youtube.com/user/ISARTDIGITAL

Abonnez-vous à la chaîne
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJsCSgLeOr5f-WwlgP2XkKg?sub_confirmation=1
